subject: Prize increases for Design projects, new Development component
body:
Hello sm1lies, 

We have increased the prizes for a number of Design projects:
 - Linux FS Tests* ($1200.00)
 - File Lifecycle Messaging Service ($1200.00)
 - Titan Test Result Service ($1200.00)
 - Titan Metadata Verification* ($1200.00)
 - Titan Segment Verification* ($1200.00)
 - Conversation Manager Entities View ($1200.00) 
 - Conversation Manager Error Handler ($1200.00)
 - Message Parser ($1200.00)
 - Message Processing Framework ($1200.00) 
 - Send Message Command ($1200.00)
   Details: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=112

In addition, we have posted the following Development-only component:
 - RPT TES Mock* ($500.00)
   Details: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=ViewActiveContests&ph=113

The starred projects (*) are all related to Rational(R) Performance Tester (RPT). To get up to speed on RPT, check out this TopCoder article: http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=tutorials&d2=rationalPerformanceTester
 
Good luck!

- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified either of new TopCoder development opportunities or TopCoder news & events. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'. In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails. Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
